@@ -13,8 +13,15 @@ pub struct HighlightedRange {
 
 fn is_control_keyword(kind: SyntaxKind) -> bool {
     match kind {
-        FOR_KW | LOOP_KW | WHILE_KW | CONTINUE_KW | BREAK_KW | IF_KW | ELSE_KW | MATCH_KW
-        | RETURN_KW => true,
+        T![for]
+        | T![loop]
+        | T![while]
+        | T![continue]
+        | T![break]
+        | T![if]
+        | T![else]
+        | T![match]
+        | T![return] => true,
         _ => false,
     }
 }
